Title: Summit LNG’s repairs to be completed by end of July: Excelerate Energy
Description: US-based LNG solutions company Excelerate Energy expects its 138,000 m3 Summit LNG floating storage regasification unit which serves Bangladesh’s 3.8 mtpa LNG import facility offshore Moheshkhali Island in the Bay of Bengal, to complete repairs and resume operations by the end of July.
Author: JS
